atlas schema apply --env local --auto-approve
cmpshow users expected.sql

    url = "URL"
    src = "./schema"
    def_val = "hello"
}

    type = string
}

  schema = schema.main

    null = false
    type = int
  }
  column "status" {
    null = true
    type = text
    default = var.def_val
  }
}

}
-- expected.sql --
